com.concordium.sdk.cis2

Class Cis2Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.cis2.Cis2Client

  • public class Cis2Client
extends Object
    A client dedicated to the CIS2 specification.

      • newClient

        public static Cis2Client newClient(ClientV2 client,
                                   ContractAddress address)
        Construct a new Cis2Client with the provided ClientV2 for the provided ContractAddress
        Parameters:
        client - client to use
        address - the address of the cis 2 contract
        Returns:
        a cis2 client for interfacing with the provided contract

      • transfer

        public Hash transfer(AccountAddress sender,
                     TransactionSigner signer,
                     Energy maxEnergyCost,
                     Cis2Transfer... transfers)
        Perform a CIS2 transfer on the contract.
        Parameters:
        sender - address of the sender of the transaction.
        signer - signer of the transaction.
        transfers - the CIS2 transfers.
        Returns:
        the transaction hash

      • updateOperator

        public Hash updateOperator(AccountAddress sender,
                           TransactionSigner signer,
                           Energy maxEnergyCost,
                           Map<AbstractAddress,Boolean> operatorUpdates)
        Update the addresses of which the owner (sender of this transaction) operates.
        Parameters:
        operatorUpdates - the updates to carry out. The keys of the map correspond to the addresses which the sender (owner) should or should not operate given by the provided boolean.
        Returns:
        the transaction hash

      • balanceOf

        public Map<BalanceQuery,TokenAmount> balanceOf(BalanceQuery... queries)
        Query the balance of token ids and associated AbstractAddress
        Parameters:
        queries - the token ids and addresses to query
        Returns:
        the balances together with the queries used

      • operatorOf

        public Map<OperatorQuery,Boolean> operatorOf(OperatorQuery... queries)
        Query whether one or more owners are operators for one or more addresses.
        Parameters:
        queries - the addresses to query.
        Returns:
        A map where the values indicate whether the specified owner was indeed operator of the supplied address.

      • tokenMetadata

        public Map<TokenId,TokenMetadata> tokenMetadata(TokenId... tokenIds)
        Query the token metadata for each provided token id
        Parameters:
        tokenIds - the token ids to query
        Returns:
        A map where the values indicate the token metadata responses for each TokenId

                                                 BlockQuery to)
        Retrieve all events emitted from the CIS2 contract.
        Parameters:
        from - block to start from
        to - block to end from
        Returns:
        the list of events.

      • getEventsFor

        public Iterator<Cis2EventWithMetadata> getEventsFor(BlockQuery... queries)
        Get any events associated emitted from the specified CIS2 contract.
        Parameters:
        queries - blocks to query
        Returns:
        the list of events.

      • getEventsForFinalizedTransaction

        public Iterator<Cis2EventWithMetadata> getEventsForFinalizedTransaction(Hash transactionHash)
        Get any events associated emitted from the specified CIS2 contract by the supplied transaction hash.
        Parameters:
        transactionHash - the hash of the transaction to query outcome for.
        Returns:
        the list of events which originated from the specified transaction hash.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction was not finalized.
